divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my friend where riding our bikes and this rocet like shooting star went slow and then shot up in the sky and so we went to go see what it was and when we got to the beach we see no one and we look up and this disc is going about 25mph and had four lights on each side and had a green glow and a sound like rum rrrrrum rum rum rrrrrummmm and we road home as fast as we can it happend in the bay of st.louis in bay st.louis MS by breeden place we were freeked out and when it pased it sort of puled allthe gravity away and we felt liter.we thought it was afire work at first
Summary: It had 4 lights 1 on each side rownd green glow and something shot up to it!!!
trends: There has been one other sighting in Waveland
There were no other sightings in Waveland on or around August 23rd 2008
